subject: Baseball
Minor Leagues
lead_paragraph: Jamie Moyer, a 49-year-old left-hander, agreed to terms on a minor league contract with an invitation to the Colorado Rockies’ spring training, pending a physical.
snippet: Jamie Moyer, a 49-year-old left-hander, agreed to terms on a minor league contract with an invitation to the Colorado Rockies’ spring training, pending a physical.
